resources.string: Start conversing to see your messages here.
Pamene mwakhala mwachita mchitidwe wakale wa mawu, mudzalera pano.
Louise ndi wosankha wamaspaniya amene angakusankhile kukulolani ndi kusintha zolankhula zanu!
Gabriel ndi mwamunthu wosamva wa mfotografi wosapemphera wolakwika!
Rakesh ndi wosankha waukulu wa maopsa ku yowa waku India amene angakusankhile kusanthula mawu anu!
Evelyn ndi woyankhula wa Uingereza amene angakusamalira kuwoneka ndi kukulowetsa kusakhala tsopano!
Ahsan ndi wamkugwiritsa ntchito mawonekedwe a software wachilamulo waku Arabu amene angakusangalatseni ndi kupangitsa bwinobwino mawu ako a chidziwitso!
Min ndi wachitsanzo wokonza vokabulari yanu!
